item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description:
Google Scholar: Citations: 510 | h-index: 12 | i10-index: 15

Employment

2019 – Present

Staff Research Engineer II

Samsung Research America, Mountain View, CA

Lead AI-driven innovation at the intersection of wearable sensing and real-world health monitoring, delivering solutions from prototyping to clinical validation.

  • Cuffless Blood Pressure Monitoring: Led ML-based BP estimation using ear-worn PPG and inertial sensors
  • Contactless Vital Sign Monitoring: Developed AI models to estimate heart rate, respiration, and SpO2 from facial video
  • AFib Burden Estimation: Led smartwatch-based AFib monitoring; published cover-featured study in IEEE JBHI (2023)
  • Advanced Bio-sensing: Spearheaded transcranial vagus nerve stimulation in earbud form factor
2018 – 2019

Data Scientist

AlayaTec, Inc., Palo Alto, CA

Developed predictive ML models from functional brain imaging (scalp/ear EEG) for analyzing complex neuro/behavioral data.

item.title: Research
item.description:
Research Interests

Wearable Health Sensing Biomedical Signal Processing Machine Learning Deep Learning Computer Vision Clinical Validation Neuroimaging Brain-Computer Interface

Current Research at Samsung Research America

Staff Research Engineer II | Digital Health Lab | 2019 – Present

Leading AI-driven innovation at the intersection of wearable sensing and real-world health monitoring.

Cuffless Blood Pressure Monitoring

Led ML-based BP estimation using ear-worn PPG and inertial sensors. Directed hardware prototyping, co-designed clinical protocols, and partnered with CROs for multi-device validation.

Contactless Vital Sign Monitoring

Developed AI models to estimate heart rate, respiration, and SpO2 from facial video. Recognized as top-performing solution with product roadmap adoption.
